dependencies.description:
Differentiate, compile, and transform Numpy code. JAX is a Python
library for accelerator-oriented array computation and program
transformation, designed for high-performance numerical computing and
large-scale machine learning.
dependencies.name: py-jax

dependencies.description:
XLA library for Jax. jaxlib is the support library for JAX. While JAX
itself is a pure Python package, jaxlib contains the binary (C/C++)
parts of the library, including Python bindings, the XLA compiler, the
PJRT runtime, and a handful of handwritten kernels.
dependencies.name: py-jaxlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: GraphCast: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting.
dependent_to.name: py-graphcast

description: Jraph: A library for Graph Neural Networks in Jax.
name: py-jraph

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
